name: LIMON GROUP
description: LIMON.GROUP system generates NFT Tokens based on Binance Smart Chain. LIMON NFT Tokens are interconnected to digital products and commercial physical products (EAN - European Article Number) distribute this between B2B or B2P. Our upcoming DEX exchange (P2P) owns an automatic market maker (AMM) for exchanging BEP-20 tokens. Liquidity pools and locks, farming and staking functionalities will be included.
